name: Purrgatorio
description:
As you fall from heaven, down to earth, maneuver into position to collect food for points and accelerate forward to smash hearts. 
Featuring original music and art by Don and Patrick of Electric Hotdog.
Inspired by Gustave Dore's Paradise Lost illustrations.
Controller Required.

Left Analogue Stick - Move
Right Trigger - Boost to break hearts.
Left Trigger - Brake  to recover from uncontrolled spins and maneuver.
